prompt: A whimsical enchanted artifact nestled within the dark and vibrant Mystic Swamp. This stone is covered in iridescent moss that emits a soft, ethereal glow. Surrounding it are twisted vines and luminous mushrooms, casting an enchanting light upon the murky waters. Ancient trees loom above, draped in hanging moss, and faint mystical symbols can be seen etched into the stone. The overall art style features dark and vibrant fantasy elements with a touch of eerie and magical lighting.
